Character.Description: A highly competent, focused woman coder

Style.Rendering: High-detail digital painting, photorealistic, concept art quality

Situations.Name: Systems Thinker at the Whiteboard
Situations.Setting: Dim office space with cluttered cubicles visible in background, corporate fluorescent lighting mixed with screen glow, hints of forgotten personal items on empty desks
Situations.Camera: Mid-shot, slightly wide angle to show environment context, subject off-center with negative space toward the organizational chaos

CharacterPose.Expression: Knowing half-smile, eyes conveying both exasperation and compassion, the look of someone who has seen this pattern before
CharacterPose.BodyPosition: Standing, weight shifted to one hip, arms crossed or one hand gesturing toward a diagram
CharacterPose.Gesture: Pointing at or annotating a systems diagram on a whiteboard or holographic display

Props.Application: Floating beside subject, hand interacting with diagram elements
